attributes.background: The idea here is in support of UN agreements on the treatment of war criminals and foreign nationals incarcerated on foreign soil and to utilise the vast global religious infrastructures to protect the innocents and save lives. Let's face it, the world is a dangerous place, but we, the undersigned, who all want peace in our time, look to our governments, political and spiritual leaders to consider preventative risk management measures - if there was perhaps something similar to medeival priest holes - then the innocent would be protected without lynchings !
